name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn off read receipts for Google Chat

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily disable/enable read receipts in Google Chat (from the Gmail page) using a toggle button

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Read Google Chat messages without sending read receipts üï∂

‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂

‚ñ∂ How to use:

1Ô∏è‚É£  After installation - go to Gmail page.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Select "Chat" from the side menu.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Now you can see the "READ RECEIPTS" button. To disable read receipts, toggle the button to "OFF".

‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂‚ú∂

‚ö†Ô∏è PLEASE NOTE! ‚ö†Ô∏è
While the read receipts are disabled, some chat functionality may not work correctly. It is recommended that you switch it back to "ON" after reading the messages.
